lead_paragraph: While Republicans retain a plausible path toward taking control of the Senate on Tuesday night, it would involve their winning at least two seats in which they appear to be underdogs, while simultaneously avoiding upsets in several other races in which they are narrowly favored. Unless the Republicans have a significant wind at their backs and are overperforming in most parts of the country, their chances of doing so are slim.
snippet: Unless the Republicans have a significant wind at their backs and are overperforming in most parts of the country, their chances of winning the Senate are slim.

headline.main: Republicans Are Clear Underdogs to Flip Senate

abstract: Unless the Republicans have a significant wind at their backs and are overperforming in most parts of the country, their chances of winning the Senate are slim.
